title: About Me
text:
About Me
I am a dedicated educator with interests in curriculum design, student-centered learning, and inclusive pedagogy. This mock page gives a brief overview of my background and approach.

Education: PhD / MA in Education
Interests: Instructional design, assessment, technology in education

Back to Home

title: Teaching Philosophy
text:
Teaching Philosophy
My teaching philosophy centers on active learning, formative assessment, and creating equitable learning environments.
Back to Home

Assignment: Write a 2-3 page reflection connecting course readings to a classroom scenario.
